Author: throwawaymillia
Text: I’ve only been in a relapse for about 4 weeks... still normal weight and I’m not sure if gastroparesis can set in that fast. But... I just feel disgusted with myself for eating one normal meal and then having a bit more... it’s hard and thanks for replying

Author: pestaname
Text: Gastroparesis can happen, the doctor will do a test on how efficiently your stomach empties and determine if everything is working correctly. If the muscle or nerve or something atrophies it can mess things up. But yeah you’re not alone at all. I work at a coffee shop and it’s really easy for me to just run off caffeine and not eat all day and then be disgusted at the thought of eating.
